Data Base theory

Introduction

Different type of database

  • Tree
  • Relational
  • object-oriented (replaced by ORM frameworks)
  • Multi-dimensional (often used in Business intelligence)
  • NoSQL (came in with big data eco system)
  • NewSQL (NoSQL with acid (strong transactional check) )

What is a transaction in a database?

Four properties of a relational database

  • Atomic
  • Consistency
  • Isolation
  • Durability

Relational model

Steps of design a database

  1. Exam business logic
  2. identify entities and relationships between entities
  3. draw the entities relation schema

What is an entity?

An entity is an existing element or an unambiguously distinguishable concept

What is association?

An association is a link between 2 or more entities

data model normalisation

  1. 1st nf
  2. 2nd nf
  3. 3rd nf
  4. boyce-Codd Form

data base optimisation

always index foreign key.
